metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8625 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
curl before version 7.51.0 uses outdated IDNA 2003 standard to handleInternational Domain Names and this may lead users to potentially andunknowingly issue network transfer requests to the wrong host.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.55.1-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.55.1-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-nss - 7.55.1-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl4 - 7.55.1-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.55.1-1ubuntu2.1').
